description: Lists the on-premises storage systems that you're using with DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: StorageSystems
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names ARNs) of the on-premises storage systems that you're using with DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: StorageSystemArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of an on-premises storage system that you added to DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of an on-premises storage system that you added to DataSync Discovery.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The opaque string that indicates the position to begin the next list of results in the response.
